segments.text: I see the woman is really focused on drying those dishes, completely oblivious to the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite surprising how she doesn't notice the puddle forming around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is being quite adventurous, climbing up to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool is really unstable, and it looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl will ever get a cookie, or if the boy will eat them all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost funny how the woman is completely unaware of the chaos happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the water overflowing is quite a hazard, and someone could slip and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad that the woman is missing all the action happening in her own kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm outside and the chaos inside is quite striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman finishes her dishes soon and notices what's happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the children are being quite cooperative, working together to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
